about_the_game: Sea of Thieves: Athena’s Fortune is the official audiobook of the debut Sea of Thieves novel by Chris Allcock, read by accomplished actor Toby Stephens. Released in print in 2018 and then as an unabridged audiobook in 2021, Athena’s Fortune tells the intertwined tales of the Pirate Lord Ramsey and adventure-seeking stowaway Larinna – both characters that players of the game would soon come to know well.
